name: Ektroid
description:
We are pioneers in web and mobile development in Mexico. We are dedicated to supplying the best online solutions and digital strategy to our clients. 
We are a full development and strategy agency. Our passion is technology and that is why we have become involved in e-commerce, back-ends and a variety of other online products and services in the past years. We have integrated social media, SEO, analytics, content marketing, conversion optimization and more to the development of an all-in-one digital strategy.
